endpoints.description: Submit property attributes to calculate and retrieve an estimated market value.
Access insights into current market trends for a specified region.
Retrieve a list of locations with desirability ratings.
Fetch detailed information for a specific property by ID.
Compare valuation details across multiple supplied properties.
Retrieve feature details of a property by its unique identifier.
Request the historical valuation data for a supplied property ID over time.
Receive property recommendations based on defined criteria.
Generate a detailed investment report for selected properties.
Retrieve statistical valuation data aggregated for a given area.
